name: North-Aire, Inc.
baseAirport: PRC -Prescott Regional - Ernest A Love Field
about: North-Aire, Inc. is a premier flying school dedicated to providing exceptional aviation training. Established with a commitment to safety and excellence, our school offers a comprehensive range of programs from private pilot licenses to commercial and instrument ratings. Our experienced instructors, state-of-the-art aircraft, and modern facilities ensure students receive top-notch education. We pride ourselves on a personalized approach, tailoring training to meet the unique needs of each student. With a strong focus on both theoretical knowledge and practical skills, North-Aire, Inc. prepares aspiring pilots for successful careers in aviation. Join us to embark on a journey to the skies with confidence and professionalism.
